TopicTitle: Is there a Map-view pointer arrow mod?

Articles.Content:
I have been warping around with RoverDude's Alcubierre Warp Drive, and I am wondering if there is a mod that puts like a pointer arrow over the craft-icon of where the nose of your craft is pointing in map view?

With such a mod, this would make Warp jumping much more efficient as I could match relative direction and relative speed with my target.

I tired NavHud and it doesn't give me what I am looking for. Thank you for your help.

You might look at NavHud [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543-0-25-NavHud-a-NavBall-inspired-Heads-Up-Display-1-1-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543-0-25-NavHud-a-NavBall-inspired-Heads-Up-Display-1-1-2)
